root.name: shorten()
root.description:
Decreases an array by one element and returns the shortened array.
When using an array of objects, the data returned from the function must be cast to the object array's data type. For example: SomeClass[] items = (SomeClass[]) shorten(originalArray).

parameter.label: array
parameter.description: boolean[], byte[], char[], int[], float[], or String[], or an array of objects

root.returns: Array (the same datatype as the input)
